name: TREE
description: TREE tells a story of a relationship between a boy and his tree. What starts off as a simple connection, over time it grows into something deeper.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 7800 (512MB cache) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 120 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: i5-2500 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX660/HD7800 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 120 MB available space
